snippet: DirecTV customers in 19 markets woke up on Sunday without Fox or the CW networks on their television sets, the result of a failed negotiation with Tribune Broadcasting.
abstract: DirecTV customers in 19 markets woke up on Sunday without Fox or the CW networks on their television sets, the result of a failed negotiation with Tribune Broadcasting.

headline.main: DirecTV and Tribune Fail to Reach Deal
headline.print_headline: Dispute Blocks Channels For DirecTV Customers
